mapper.select: SELECT c.name AS channel_name, c.description AS channel_description, c.network_adapter, c.multiple_types_device_driver, c.modbus_max_sockets, c.modbus_one_or_more_sockets, c.modbus_port_number, c.modbus_protocol, d.name as device_name, d.description as device_description, d.driver, d.ip, d.scan_mode, d.scan_rate as device_scan_rate, d.model, d.port_number, d.modbus_port_number, t.name as tag_name, t.description as tag_description, t.address, t.data_type, t.`read_write`, t.scan_rate FROM channels_profile c, devices_profile d, tags_profile t WHERE t.channel_name = c.name AND t.device_name = d.name AND c.name =d.channel_name and t.profile = #{profile} and c.profile = #{profile} and d.profile = #{profile}
